name: Purification Heroes
description:
This project is a prototype, so if you like it, please leave feedback in the comments, and consider making a donation so I can keep developing it. Also if you encounter any bugs, you feel like some mechanics are too weak or too powerful, or you have an idea on new features, feel free to mention it in the comments or email me at tribe.of.mammoths@gmail.com.

Existing features
  • full game content & mechanics are available
    • over 40 types of monsters
    • more than 90 different cards
    • 9 terrains, and a unique shop for each one
    • testing different strategies and balancing is still in progress
  • random generated maps
    • map size and game length selection
    • automatic playability testing after generating
  • game modes:
    • hotseat multiplayer for 2-6 players
    • single player
  • extensive rulebook, manual and appendices for game content
  • save game to local file (and load game)
Upcoming features

(If I get enough support and see that it's worth it. You can let me know which of these do you want most.)

  • new game content
    • some new cards  & monsters
    • I have several possible expansion in mind
  • testing & balancing different game mechanics (cards, monsters, etc.)
  • highscore tracker (mainly in single player mode)
  • auto save feature
  • more game modes or options for random generated maps
  • some handmade maps (even fan-made perhaps)
  • improving hotseat multiplayer
    • tracking your opponents' movements
    • more information displayed on opponents
  • game server (only if there's a stable player base)
    • online multiplayer modes
    • online save & load game (so you can easily access your games on different devices)
  • single player mode against AI
  • music
  • improved graphics
